About.p-text: With the experience of 12 years, ARAJ is a brand creation & design studio rooted in INDIA.
About.h-text: Creativity captures Attention.It sparks Imagination. From Big Events to everyday posts
About.paragraph1: We act creative with attention and boldness to discover the potential of your brand. The first rule when creating value through design elements is to ensure they look aesthetically appealing. We believe that harmony has enormous impact and only the precise balance of forms will allow this harmony to emerge.
About.paragraph2: STUDIO ARAJ offers design services in sectors as diverse as Travel & Tourism, Fashion & Beauty, Hospitality, Financial Services, Luxury, Entertainment & Food, Healthcare, Education & things you ask for.
